title: Task 1: Describe form, style, materials, technique, or content
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe a visual characteristic of the work
Response accurately describes one visual characteristic of the work.
Response accurately describes two visual characteristics of the work.

title: Task 2: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, or content shape the work
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does not accurately uses specific evidence to explain a technique Cezanne uses to create a sense of space in this work.
The response accurately uses specific evidence to explain one technique Cezanne uses to create a sense of space in this work.
The response accurately uses specific evidence to explain two techniques Cezanne uses to create a sense of space in this work.

title: Task 3: Explain how this work departs from earlier Western traditions of landscape painting
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately explain how this work departs from earlier Western traditions of landscape painting.
The response accurately explains how this work departs from earlier Western traditions of landscape painting.
